processingCommand.script:
IF "${ExportCopyName}"=="" GOTO SKIPSTEP
:IMPORT
Echo on
IF "${DateOverrideFile}" EQU "" (
  ${XT_COPYFILE} from="${ExportFileName}" to="${ExportCopyName}" ${ExportCopyOptions}
) ELSE (
  ${XT_COPYFILE} from="${ExportFileName}" to="${ExportCopyName}" datefile="${DateOverrideFile}" ${ExportCopyOptions}
)
Echo Off
set retcode=%errorlevel%
echo CopyFile ended with return code: %retcode%
IF %retcode% EQU 0 GOTO NORMALFLOW
GOTO ERRORFLOW
:NORMALFLOW
set resexe=0
GOTO END
:ERRORFLOW
set resexe=1
GOTO END
:SKIPSTEP
Echo ExportCopyName variable is not defined, step is skipped
set resexe=0
GOTO END
:END
exit %resexe%
